posts.title: Welcome to the Social Demo
posts.body: This is the first post in our little demo app. It is seeded from a static JSON file and lives entirely in memory. Refresh the page to reset everything back to its original state.

comments.body: Nice post, Alice! Glad to see this working.
Looking forward to seeing this evolve step by step.
Great scaffold! The in-memory data layer is a neat approach.
